about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Innovation in Property Management
about.description: Discover our mission to revolutionize property management through innovative technology and exceptional service.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with the vision of simplifying property management, Neo Rent has grown from a small startup to a leading platform trusted by thousands of property managers worldwide.
story.paragraph2: Our team of experts combines years of real estate experience with cutting-edge technology to create solutions that truly make a difference in the daily lives of property managers.
story.paragraph3: We believe that property management should be efficient, transparent, and stress-free for both landlords and tenants.

clientProximity.title: Client Proximity
clientProximity.description: We build lasting relationships with our clients through personalized support and attentive service.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously evolve our platform to meet the changing needs of the property management industry.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from product development to customer service.

growth.title: Growth

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: How do I get started with Neo Rent?
items.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply contact our team to schedule a demo and we'll help you set up your account and import your property data.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular backups to protect your data.

items.question: Can I import my existing property data?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our team will help you import your existing property and tenant data from spreadsheets or other property management systems.

items.question: Do you offer customer support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive customer support including phone, email, and chat support during business hours, plus extensive documentation and video tutorials.

login.title: Connect to your space
login.subtitle: Manage your real estate properties with ease
login.profileWarning: Your account must be configured by your property manager before first login. If you get an "Access denied" error, contact your manager to activate your account.
